review: So far I have only tried youtube and netflix on this guy but it works great. If you have a good internet connection the quality is really good after a moment of the video loading up. I have been sending video to my tv from my smartphone and it works pretty seamlessly!
author: mizz

review: I ditched cable and went 100% google chromecast.  I love this thing.  Works like a charm all the time, great access to all my desired content.  The best part of this thing is that you use a cell phone, tablet, or any computer connected to the same wireless as the remote control.  You can literally choose a show to watch and then completely turn off the device used to select said show.  No battery drain, no streaming through the cell phone, tablet or computer.  Just easy and awesome streaming.
